jp_name: E.S.P 訓練ボックス Esupa Kunren Bokkusu
function: This gadget is used for bringing 3 different psychic abilities out in the user, but it takes years to master them.
This gadget is used to move through the hole to the Earth.

jp_name: こだまラッカー Kodama rakkā
function:
Just spray the gadget on and it will produce an echo; making it seem like someone's responding even if there is no one there.
This gadget can be removed using its remover.

jp_name: こだまなおしラッカー Kodama naoshi rakkā
function: It's used to remove Echo Lacquer effects.

jp_name: 感情エネルギーボンベ Kanjō enerugī bonbe
function: It's used to absorb anger energy, and converted as energy power so it can charge up electric things like, a plug-in fan, a celing light, an RC car, or anything that runs on battries/plug-in to walls. And it is very useful to calm that person down from being mad. The cylinder cannot absorb anymore anger energy once it's full.

jp_name: 国際保護動物スプレー Kokusaihogo Dōbutsu Supurē
function: This gadget is used for making an animal who, when sprayed with this gadget, becomes endangered; protected from any torture.

jp_name: エネルギーバルブ Enerugī Barubu
function: This gadget is used to increase the usual flow of energy.

Essence Parts (Japanese: エキス・パーツ Ekisu pātsu) is one of Doraemon's gadgets that first appeared in the anime episode I Humbly Accept Your Good Points.
This gadget extracts the essence of someone's body and lets other people have it for a period of time.
appears_in: I Humbly Accept Your Good Points

jp_name: ミニブラックホール Miniburakkuhōru
function:
This gadget is basically the miniature version of a big bad black hole which usually stay in space. Black holes are such things that even don't let light escape from itself so this gadget has to be handled very carefully! One mistake and slowly you, your house, your city, country, continent and then the entire planet gets sucked in! This gadget is just as scary as a real black hole...
If you drink a medicine that breaks the effects of this gadget, the sucked objects however will reappeared in the supposed place that your...
When others are displayed this item, they will become hypnotized and ignore or even endorse all misdeeds the user performs. This doesn't apply to the user, however.

jp_name: 進化退化ビーム Shinka Taika Bīmu
function: This gadget is used to evolve or devolve/degenerate anything whether living or inanimate objects.
appears_in: A Visitor from the Country of the Future/U.S. English dub

jp_name: ばくはつコショウ Baku hatsu koshō
function: When the user uses this pepper and sprinkles at other people's nose, then those people will sneeze (within powerful energy). That energy causes the user to fly but, remember, when people are preparing to sneeze the user must say out the place where the user wants to go, if not the user will fly in the sky non-stop. There is a problem with this gadget, if the people who had been sprinkled by the user covers his/her mouth when he/she sneezes, the power from his/her sneeze will be less and the user can only fly for a short distance.

jp_name: 表情 コントローラー Hyōjō Kontorōrā
function: It is used to control one's mood or expression. Pressing a certain button will make one laugh, another will make one sad, and so on.
